title: Deep Roots | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Deep Roots | Joel Osteen
description:
Many people today are easily influenced by their circumstances. But life is too short to let any setback steal your joy. When you’re unmoved by what’s happening around you, you will be free to live your life to the fullest. 

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
